dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.
dependencies.name: wget

description: Utility for interacting with GRIB2 files
name: wgrib2

variants.description: Use the libaec library for packing with GRIB2 template
variants.name: aec

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Some machines do not support the alarm to terminate wgrib2
variants.name: disable_alarm

variants.description: Some machines do not support timezones
variants.name: disable_timezone

variants.description: Make wgrib2api which allows fortran code to read/write grib2
variants.name: fortran_api

variants.description: Include NCEP g2clib (mainly for testing purposes)
variants.name: g2c

variants.description: Use to interpolate to new grids (0 = OFF, 1 = ip, 3 = ip2)
variants.name: ipolates

variants.description: Link in interface to MySQL to write to mysql database
variants.name: mysql

variants.description: Link in netcdf3 library to write netcdf3 files
variants.name: netcdf3

variants.description: Link in netcdf4 library to write netcdf3/4 files
variants.name: netcdf4

variants.description: The proj4 library is used to verify gctpc.
variants.name: proj4

variants.description: Add commands for user-defined functions and shell commands
variants.name: udf
